entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
